name: ExportOptionsGIF
shortdesc: Options which may be supplied when exporting a document as a GIF file.

property.name: colorCount
property.shortdesc: Number of colors in exported color table.

property.name: colorReduction
property.shortdesc: Method used to reduce the number of colors.

property.name: infoLossPercent
property.shortdesc: Level of information loss during compression.

property.name: ditherPercent
property.shortdesc: How much should the colors be dithered.

property.name: webSnap
property.shortdesc: How much should the color table be changed to match the web pallet.

property.name: transparency
property.shortdesc: Should the resulting image use transparency.

property.name: interlaced
property.shortdesc: Should the resulting image be interlaced.

property.name: matte
property.shortdesc: Should the artboard be matted with a color.

property.name: matteColor
property.shortdesc: The color to use when matting the artboard (default: white)

property.name: antiAliasing
property.shortdesc: Should the resulting image be antialiased.

property.name: artBoardClipping
property.shortdesc: Should the resulting image be clipped to the artboard.

property.name: saveAsHTML
property.shortdesc: Should the resulting image be saved as HTML.
